text:
Hi folks, we’re working on an updated version of the default form module, along with some updates to the form field. Would anyone be interested in trying it out as part of the beta?

The updates are primarily to improve the usability of adding and editing forms in the page editor. Users in the page editor will now be able to create new forms right from within the sidebar, as well as update the order and labels of existing forms.
If you’re interested, DM me your portal ID!
